#summary Installation guide for CarFrontEnd
#labels Phase-Deploy,Featured

= Introduction =

How to install the CarFrontEnd application

= Details =

  # Download [http://mac-carfrontend.googlecode.com/files/CarFrontEndAPI.zip CarFrontEndAPI.zip] and extract the Framework
  # Move CarFrontEndAPI.framework into ~/Library/Frameworks or /Library/Frameworks
  # Download [http://mac-carfrontend.googlecode.com/files/CarFrontEnd.zip CarFrontEnd.zip] and extract the application.
  # Move the Application to the folder (e.g. /Applications) you would like to keep it in.

Run the app and enjoy.
